data.name: Lightspeed Dating
data.detailed_description:
How well do you know your friends really? How well do you know their mannerisms, their speech patterns, their secrets? If they were replaced by a shapeshifting monster, becoming indistinguishable by sound and appearance alone, would you still be able to tell them apart? And, if you were to be that shapeshifting monster, do you know them well enough... to become them?

It's the year 20XX. In a future devoid of societal empathy the only path left to true human connection is through violence. Five of the universes hottest bachelors have been acquired from around the galaxy and as a shapeshifting alien is set loose upon them they have been given only two options: truly understand one another or die.

In this revolutionary new kind of social deduction game players voices become indistinguishable from one another thanks to a new machine learning powered voice filter. Each round players get paired up in rooms together where they have to closely inspect one anothers "realness", as one of them has taken on the role of a shapeshifting monster and disguised themselves in the skin of their friends, trying their best to emulate their speech patterns and opinions.

As your voice chat partner judges you by your every word choice, claimed opinion and speech patterns, you have to both convince your opponent that you're the person you're disguised as, as well as that you're earnestly examining them on their own realness. Many strategies can lead to victory, but all require acting skills, smarts and, most of all: confidence.

data.short_description: A cyberpunk social deduction game in which players voices are made unidentifiable. Perfectly copy your friends speech patterns, mannerisms and opinions to win in this intense experimental party game. Find out how well you really know your friends!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Processor with AVX Instruction set
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Headphones
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Processor with AVX2 Instruction set
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Headphones and dedicated Microphone

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
